short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily clip web content with the ITONICS Web Clipper.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline your content clipping process with ITONICS Web Clipper for Enterprise. Discover and save web-based inspirations directly into your ITONICS Innovation Operating System.

Never miss an opportunity while browsing the web again! ITONICS Web Clipper empowers you to capture inspirations in real-time, seamlessly integrating them into your workflow.

Whether it's an intriguing news article or a thought-provoking blog post, simply click the clipper symbol on your browser. A window will pop up, automatically populating title, description, and image details from the page. Make any necessary edits, and voil√†! Your inspiration is promptly uploaded to the ITONICS platform for future reference. Say goodbye to lost ideas or missed inspirations!

Remember, even the smallest spark can ignite significant innovations. Enhance your ideation process with ITONICS Web Clipper. Let every idea or inspiration contribute to shaping the future.

This plugin seamlessly integrates with the ITONICS Enterprise solution after a swift setup. Contact ITONICS for further details: support@itonics-innovation.com.
